<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Blessing of Defiance](/Spells.aspx?ID=871)
<actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** varies
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

Channeling forth the power to persevere in the face of adversity, you grant the target the means to deny danger and avoid dire harm. Choose one saving throw: Fortitude, Reflex, or Will. The target gets a +4 status bonus to that saving throw for 1 round. The potency and number of targets of this blessing depend on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

 **<actions string="Single Action" /> (somatic)** The spell targets you or one willing ally within range.

 **<actions string="Two Actions" /> (verbal)** The spell targets you or one willing ally within range. If you choose Fortitude, the target gains resistance 15 to [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126). If you choose Reflex, the target gains a +15-foot status bonus to its Speeds. If you choose Will, the target gains resistance 15 to mental damage.

 **<actions string="Three Actions" /> (verbal)** The spell targets you and all willing allies within 30 feet.
name: Blessing of Defiance
